name: Startup
info:
This group is the startup sequence for the flow

This is where the text file with the email message and data will be extracted from the folder and the filename will be saved as a flow variable

This is also where the last flow.email and flow.data get reset and cleared

name: get the filename
clear flow variables
func:
flow.set("dateOfAnalysis",0);                           // int
flow.set("reportNum","");                          // varchar(50)
flow.set("location","");                                 // varchar(10)
flow.set("partName","");                                // varchar(100)
flow.set("JK",0.0);                                       // decimal(8,3)
flow.set("HI",0.0);                                       // decimal(8,3)
flow.set("FG",0.0);                                       // decimal(8,3)
flow.set("CE",0.0);                                       // decimal(8,3)
flow.set("FI",0.0);                                       // decimal(8,3)
flow.set("DE",0.0);                                       // decimal(8,3)
flow.set("K",0);                                           // int
flow.set("J",0);                                           // int
flow.set("I",0);                                           // int
flow.set("H",0);                                           // int
flow.set("weight",0.0);                               // decimal(8,3)
flow.set("occupancy",0.0);                         // decimal(8,3)
flow.set("met_len",0);                               // int
flow.set("met_width",0);                           // int
flow.set("non_met_len",0);                        // int
flow.set("non_met_width",0);                      // int
flow.set("fiber_len",0);                           // int
flow.set("total_fibers",0.0);                      // decimal(8,3)
flow.set("out_of_control",[]);                // varchar(100)
flow.set("out_of_reaction",[]);              // varchar(100)
flow.set("result","");                                // varchar(50)
flow.set("numOfComponents",0);               // int
flow.set("partWeight",0.0);                       // decimal(8,3)

flow.set("text_files",[]);

return msg;
